mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College president, Brother Bernard LoCoco posed with school supporters at a meeting of the President's Club. (L-R): Dick Gadomski, Maury Wade, Brother Bernard LoCoco, Lance Forsdick, John McCabe.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
